name: Doom Gnome
description:
https://liluo.io/instant-builds/bba91e76-1470-4b96-8869-ead7cdb9c69e 

This game is a fun endless run! You, the player, are a gnome and you can shoot axes out of a handy bazooka. You happen to find yourself in hell and, as you can probably assume, the creatures are not the friendliest around. You have 3 hearts, 3 chances of getting hit by the enemies, so try and get the highest score possible before consuming them all!

On PC the controls are  A/D - left and right, SPACE - jump, LEFT MOUSE BUTTON - shoot

Thank you for playing our game! 

Made by Artoomics
